title: Weather Plugin Configuration
description: Configuration schema for the Weather plugin - displays current conditions, hourly forecast, and daily forecast

enabled.description: Enable or disable the weather plugin

display_duration.description: How long to display each weather mode in seconds

update_interval.description: How often to fetch new weather data in seconds (minimum 300 = 5 minutes to respect API rate limits)

api_key.description: OpenWeatherMap API key (required - get one at https://openweathermap.org/api). Store in config_secrets.json for security.
api_key.title: API Key

location_state.description: State or province name (optional but recommended for US cities to avoid ambiguity)
location_state.title: State/Province

location_country.description: Country code (e.g., US, GB, CA, FR). Use ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 codes.
location_country.title: Country Code

display_format.description: Display format for current weather. Supports placeholders: {temp}, {condition}, {humidity}, {wind}
display_format.title: Display Format

show_current_weather.description: Show current weather conditions with temperature, humidity, UV index, and wind
show_current_weather.title: Show Current Weather

show_hourly_forecast.description: Show hourly forecast for the next 24 hours
show_hourly_forecast.title: Show Hourly Forecast

show_daily_forecast.description: Show daily forecast for the next 3-7 days
show_daily_forecast.title: Show Daily Forecast
